dql.name: CONTACTGROUP_SERVICES
dql.query: SELECT DISTINCT s.service_object_id AS object_id FROM IcingaServices s INNER JOIN s.contactgroups cg INNER JOIN cg.members cgm INNER JOIN cgm.object ocgm WHERE ocgm.name1 = '${username}' AND s.config_type = '${retained_flag}'

dql.name: CONTACTGROUP_HOSTS
dql.query: SELECT DISTINCT h.host_object_id AS object_id FROM IcingaHosts h INNER JOIN h.contactgroups cg INNER JOIN cg.members cgm INNER JOIN cgm.object ocgm WHERE ocgm.name1 = '${username}' AND h.config_type = '${retained_flag}'

dql.name: TARGET_CONTACTGROUPS
dql.query:
SELECT DISTINCT cg.alias, cg.contactgroup_id, cg.contactgroup_object_id FROM IcingaContactgroups cg INNER JOIN cg.members cgm INNER JOIN cgm.object ocgm
WHERE ocgm.name1 = '${username}' AND cg.config_type = '${retained_flag}'
